mapper.select: SELECT MSG_NO, u1.USER_NICK AS SEND_USER_NICKNAME, m.SEND_USER_NO, m.MSG_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE,'YY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') AS SEND_DATE FROM MESSAGE_BOX m JOIN "USER" u1 ON m.SEND_USER_NO = u1.USER_NO WHERE m.RECEIVER_USER_NO = #{receiverUserNo} ORDER BY MSG_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE_BOX (MSG_NO, SEND_USER_NO, RECEIVER_USER_NO, MSG_CONTENT, OPEN_DATE, SEND_DATE) VALUES (5, #{sendUserNo}, #{receiverUserNo}, #{msgContent}, NULL, DEFAULT)
